segments.text: You must like to dance , right .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'd love to . Do you often come here to dance ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I like the old style dance , such as waltz „ÄÅ rumba and so on . They are quite graceful .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You are waltzing quite wonderfully . It's great to dance with a experience and talent partner .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you for saying . I think you are light on your toes too . Oh , the music starts again , would you like to have another dance , miss ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ok , that would be great . Do you like modern dance ? I don't care for it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Neither do I . I don't like any kind of modern dances all .
segments.speaker: S1
